paragraphs: The garrison is weak. Our near constant raiding of their supply caravans has left them stretched thin and scrambling. To further our good fortune, I'm pleased to report that I've perfected the reagent at long last. My new substance is strong enough to collapse the supports of the bridge. I should only need a few points of contact on the pillars themselves in order to destroy the cavern entirely.
We have a way underground, too. The garrison suspects nothing. All goes according to plan.
Dragon Bridge will soon fall, just as you have ordered.
